original_title: Ở phường Thành Công có làng Thành Công
overview: In an old district of Hanoi, formerly a village, new loud speakers must be repaired and installed. By observing everyday life, Vang Anh films with humor the animation caused by this event and plunges us into the heart of Vietnamese contradictions.
title: Thanh Công village, Thanh Công neighbourhood
